item.description: Quick Start # Example Plugin # lib.rs // Define a function that is imported into the module. // See the list (TODO) what functions are available to be imported. // We use here the send_notice function which sends a m.notice event extern "C" { fn send_notice(content_ptr: *const u8, content_len: usize, room_id_ptr: *const u8, room_id_len: usize); } // Export a function named "main_plugin". This can be called // from the framework!
